snippet: Police have been arresting anyone they think is an antigovernment demonstrator, so protesters have adopted new tactics, such as using flash mobs and practicing yoga in public parks.
abstract: Police in Moscow have begun detaining anyone they think is an anti-government demonstrator, so protesters are adopting new tactics, such as using flash mobs and practicing yoga in public parks, to avoid the mass arrests.

byline.original: By ANDREW E. KRAMER and MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ

lead_paragraph: Police have been arresting anyone they think is an antigovernment demonstrator, so protesters have adopted new tactics, such as using flash mobs and practicing yoga in public parks.

headline.seo: Protesters in Moscow Try New Tactics to Avoid Arrests
headline.main: Protesters in Moscow Alter Approach to Avoid Arrests
headline.print_headline: Protesters in Moscow Alter Approach to Avoid Arrests
